channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: International court prosecutor who charged Netanyahu faces sexual misconduct accusation
item.description: As the International Criminal Court’s top prosecutor sought war crimes charges this year against Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu, he was engulfed in a behind-the-scenes personal crisis.

item.title: Biden tries again at student loan cancellation, this time for those with financial hardships
item.description: The Biden administration is moving ahead with a new path to student loan cancellation for Americans who face steep medical bills, child care costs and other types of financial hardship that prevent them from repaying their loans.

item.title: AP Week in Pictures: Global
item.description: Oct. 18-24, 2024Pictures of Britain’s King Charles and Queen Camilla were projected on the sails of the Sydney Opera House soon after their arrival in Australia; migrants walked along the Huixtla highway in the state of Chiapas, Mexico, hoping to reach the country’s northern border and ultimately the United States;
